1.name: The General
1.description: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

2.name: Faust: Eine deutsche Volkssage
2.description: The demon Mephisto wagers with God that he can corrupt a mortal man's soul.

4.name: Die Abenteuer des Prinzen Achmed
4.description: A handsome prince rides a flying horse to faraway lands and embarks on magical adventures, which include befriending a witch, meeting Aladdin, battling demons and falling in love with a princess.

6.description: After having a child out of wedlock, a young Puritan woman is pressured to reveal the name of her lover.

7.description: A man takes a job at an asylum with hopes of freeing his imprisoned wife.

8.name: The Temptress
8.description: An architect tries suppressing his passion for a seductive woman.

9.description: A masked criminal who dresses like a giant bat terrorizes the guests at an old house rented by a mystery writer.

10.description: In the Kentucky hills, a store keeper tries to win the love of an innocent schoolteacher. She runs away and seeks refuge with a hermit.

12.name: Mat
12.description: The Film Version Of Gorki's Great Story Of The 1905 Revolution

15.name: The Son of the Sheik
15.description: The son of the sheik and a dancing girl fall in love, but when he is made to believe she has betrayed him he seeks revenge.

16.name: Don Juan
16.description: In 16th Century Italy, devil-may-care playboy Don Juan runs afoul of the despotic Borgias.

17.description: Three outlaws come to the aid of a young girl after her father is killed.

18.name: Battling Butler
18.description: A love-struck weakling must pretend to be boxer in order to gain respect from the family of the girl he loves.

19.description: Molly, the eldest child at a baby farm hidden deep in a swamp, must rescue the others when their cruel master decides that one of them will be disposed of.

20.description: A magician/alchemist, seeking to create life, finds that he needs the "blood of a virgin" to continue his experiments. He sends out his dwarf assistant to pick out the right girl.

21.description: An irresponsible young millionaire changes his tune when he falls for the daughter of a downtown minister.

22.name: The Blackbird
22.description: Two thieves, the Blackbird and West End Bertie, fall in love with the same girl, a French nightclub performer named Fifi. Each man tries to outdo the other to win her heart.

23.name: La Bohème
23.description: A group of starving artists try to survive in 1830s Paris, including a seamstress and the would-be playwright she loves.

30.description: Rafael Sabatini's story of the swashbuckling era and of Bardeleys, the handsome courtier who could win any woman he set his mind to...and was not above boasting about it to all who would listen.

39.description: While building an irrigation system for a Southwestern desert community, an engineer vies with a local cowboy for the affections of a rancher's daughter.

44.description: Young girl becomes a "flapper", defying her parents and the community.

45.name: The Road to Mandalay
45.description: A former captain tries to reunite with his daughter, twenty years after leaving her as an infant.
